jobDescription: Role Purpose Product Madness is bringing some of the best and most engaging slot machines online and to mobile and we want you to join our world class insights and analytics team. We are looking for driven and intelligent individuals to increase our data analytics capabilities, partnering with internal teams to tell a story on customer behavior and provide clarity using insights from large amounts of data. As a manager of our data science team you will lead a team of data scientists to help build and analyze customer insights, predictive analytics and behavioral modelling projects that will encourage users to play our games more often and over longer periods of time. This role will report to our VP of Marketing along with an indirect report to our Director of Data Science. This role will work with the teams here in San Francisco along with our global team located in London.
